narrative: Introduced dev_start.sh script to build and launch Langflow servers, and documented MiAct agent possibilities in STORY.md.
purpose: Facilitate local testing of new MiAct agents with a build-and-run script and user story.
scene: Developers can now quickly start backend and frontend to experiment with MiAct flows.
user_input:
create a bash script that will enable us to build and launch our development server for testing this feature.

create STORY.md where you will tell the story of what is possible with that feature.  publish that key into the space using tushell
